titles.title: I Didn’t Know How To Sing The Songs Of Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I didn’t know how to sing the songs of Zion When I was lost in sin. All my life was searching and striving I had no peace within. Then Jesus came, spoke my name And whispered peace to me. Now I’ve taken my harp down Off that willow tree.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve taken my harp down off the willow tree. My heart is singing the victory. My past is forgiven, my hope is within Him, All sorrow is gone, the glory has shown And now I am free.{/lang-eng}
